title: Trimming, early 19th century
medium: White and colored silks in uncut velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Shield, with plumed helmet above it, showing armorial devices.  Colors are yellow, black, red, blue, and purple on white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trimming, early 19th century.
early 19th century. White and colored silks in uncut velvet weave.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-55.
